member.summary: Gets or sets the pledge amount that is promised to be given at the specified .

member.remarks: An example is that a person pledges $100.00 to be given monthly for the next year. This value will be $100.00 and the grand total of the pledge would be $1,200.00

member.name: T:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods
member.summary: Boolean Extensions
DateTime and TimeStamp Extensions
System.Enum extensions
Handy string extensions that don't require any nuget packages

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Bit(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a numeric 1 (if true) or 0 (if false).

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToYesNo(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns either "Yes" or "No".

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToTrueFalse(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the string "True" or "False".

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Age(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns the age at the current date.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Age(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the age at the current date.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.TotalMonths(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: The total months.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.TotalYears(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: The total years.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToElapsedString(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a friendly elapsed time string.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToElapsedString(System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a friendly elapsed time string.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToRelativeDateString(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a string in FB style relative format (x seconds ago, x minutes ago, about an hour ago, etc.). or if max days has already passed in FB datetime format (February 13 at 11:28am or November 5, 2011 at 1:57pm).
member.param: the datetime to convert to relative time.
maximum number of days before formatting in FB date-time format (ex. November 5, 2011 at 1:57pm)

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToRelativeDateString(System.DateTime,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns a string in relative format (x seconds ago, x minutes ago, about an hour ago, in x seconds, in x minutes, in about an hour, etc.) or if time difference is greater than max days in long format (February 13 at 11:28am or November 5, 2011 at 1:57pm).
member.param: the datetime to convert to relative time.
maximum number of days before formatting in long format (ex. November 5, 2011 at 1:57pm)

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToJavascriptMilliseconds(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts the date to an Epoch of milliseconds since 1970/1/1.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToMonthDayString(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts the date to a string containing month and day values ( culture-specific ).

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.StartOfWeek(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns the date of the start of the week for the specified date/time For example, if Monday is considered the start of the week: "2015-05-13" would return "2015-05-11" from http://stackoverflow.com/a/38064/1755417

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.EndOfWeek(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns the date of the last day of the week for the specified date/time For example, if Monday is considered the start of the week: "2015-05-13" would return "2015-05-17" from http://stackoverflow.com/a/38064/1755417

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.SundayDate(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Sundays the date.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.GetWeekOfMonth(System.DateTime,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Gets the week of month. from http://stackoverflow.com/a/2136549/1755417 but with an option to specify the FirstDayOfWeek
member.param: The first day of week. For example" RockDateTime.FirstDayOfWeek

member.name: F:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods._gregorianCalendar
member.summary: The _gregorian calendar from http://stackoverflow.com/a/2136549/1755417

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.GetWeekOfYear(System.DateTime,System.Globalization.CalendarWeekRule,System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Gets the week of year. from http://stackoverflow.com/a/2136549/1755417, but with an option to specify the FirstDayOfWeek (for example RockDateTime.FirstDayOfWeek)

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToShortDateTimeString(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Converts a datetime to the short date/time format.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ToTimeString(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Returns a TimeSpan as h:mm AM/PM (culture invariant) Examples: 1:45 PM, 12:01 AM

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.GetDecimalPrecision(System.Decimal)
member.summary: Returns the number of digits following the decimal place. 5.68 would return 2. 17.9998 would return 4.

member.summary: Returns the floor (round down) value with the given decimal precision

member.summary: Converts to the enum value to its string value.

member.summary: Gets the enum description.

member.summary: Converts to int.

member.summary: Converts to enum or null.

member.summary: Removes any carriage return and/or line feed characters.

member.summary: Removes special characters from the string so that only Alpha, Numeric, '.' and '_' remain;

member.summary: Determines whether the string is not null or whitespace.

member.summary: Determines whether [is null or white space].

member.summary: Determines whether the string is made up of only digits

member.summary: Makes the Int64 hash code from the provided string.

member.summary: removes any invalid FileName chars in a filename from http://stackoverflow.com/a/14836763/1755417

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.SplitCase(System.String)
member.summary: Splits a Camel or Pascal cased identifier into seperate words.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.SplitDelimitedValues(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string array that contains the substrings in this string that are delimited by any combination of whitespace, comma, semi-colon, or pipe characters.
member.param: if set to true whitespace will be treated as a delimiter

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ReplaceCaseInsensitive(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces every instance of oldValue (regardless of case) with the newValue. (from http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/10890/Fastest-C-Case-Insenstive-String-Replace)

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ReplaceWhileExists(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces every instance of oldValue with newValue. Will continue to replace values after each replace until the oldValue does not exist.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.EscapeQuotes(System.String)
member.summary: Adds escape character for quotes in a string.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Quoted(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds Quotes around the specified string and escapes any quotes that are already in the string.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Left(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the specified number of characters, starting at the left side of the string.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.Truncate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Truncates a string after a max length and adds ellipsis. Truncation will occur at first space prior to maxLength.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.AsNumeric(System.String)
member.summary: Removes any non-numeric characters.

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.ReplaceLastOccurrence(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the last occurrence of a given string with a new value

member.summary: The true strings for AsBoolean and AsBooleanOrNull.

member.summary: Returns True for 'True', 'Yes', 'T', 'Y', '1' (case-insensitive).
member.param: if set to true [result if null or empty].

member.name: M:Slingshot.Core.ExtensionMethods.AsBooleanOrNull(System.String)
member.summary: Returns True for 'True', 'Yes', 'T', 'Y', '1' (case-insensitive), null for emptystring/null.

member.summary: Attempts to convert string to an dictionary using the |/comma and ^ delimiter Key/Value syntax. Returns an empty dictionary if unsuccessful.

member.summary: Attempts to convert string to an dictionary using the |/comma and ^ delimiter Key/Value syntax. Returns null if unsuccessful.

member.summary: Attempts to convert string to integer. Returns 0 if unsuccessful.

member.summary: Attempts to convert string to Guid. Returns null if unsuccessful.

member.summary: Replaces special Microsoft Word chars with standard chars For example, smart quotes will be replaced with apostrophes from http://www.andornot.com/blog/post/Replace-MS-Word-special-characters-in-javascript-and-C.aspx
